parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Rack and Pinion Steering Gear
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective rack and pinion steering gear can cause the steering system to lock up or fail, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering system locks up or becomes difficult to turn
especially when the vehicle is cold (cold power steering)
the rack and pinion gear fails

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as the vehicle may not be able to stop or slow down in a timely manner.
symptoms: inability to stop or slow down
brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal travels to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Master cylinder failure can cause a loss of brake fluid, leading to brake failure, which can result in accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal travels to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the hydraulic pump motor can cause the anti-lock braking system (ABS) to malfunction, leading to loss of control and increased stopping distances, which can result in accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: inability to stop or slow down

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Rear brake failure can cause the vehicle to lose traction, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: inability to stop or slow down

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the automatic transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or refuses to shift gears

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the CV boot can cause the CV joint to wear out prematurely, leading to vibrations, noise, and loss of vehicle control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: the CV boot is torn or damaged
grease or lubricant leaks from the CV joint.
